about_the_game:
Creator - [deep.sleeper] Saga

Embark on an epic journey across multiple volumes in this narrative-driven RPG series that weaves together the fates of Sonder Moor, his companions, and the enigmatic being known as The Orchestrator.

Volume Contents

This purchase includes all three volumes of the [deep.sleeper] saga:

  • vol01: "What The Sky Looks Like" - Available at launch

  • vol02: "The Weather In October" - Available at launch

  • vol03 - In development (Details to be announced)

vol01: "What The Sky Looks Like"

Begin your journey in the underground city of Lornis on the planet Galadros. This adventure RPG combines rich visual novel storytelling with classic RPG elements, serving as the entry point into the saga's intricate narrative.

vol02: "The Weather In October"

Dive into a vast open world teeming with life and mystery. Track, hunt, and catalog over 370 unique monsters while uncovering the deeper threads of the saga's story. With numerous side quests and a sweeping main narrative, this volume significantly expands the scope of the Creator universe and [deep.sleeper] saga.

vol03

Further details about this volume will be revealed at a later date.

Experience the first two volumes of this ambitious saga at launch, with the third volume included in your purchase when it releases.Key Features

  • Rich Content Across Three Volumes

    • vol01: 6 hours of gameplay

    • vol02: 30+ hours of gameplay

    • vol03: 45 hours of gameplay

    • Total saga playtime: ~85 hours

  • Deep Combat Systems

    • Classic turn-based battles

    • Unique status effects and abilities

    • Strategic mech combat

    • Arena battles

  • Expansive World & Activities

    • Massive open world to explore

    • Dungeon crawling

    • Base building

    • Farming system

    • Optional companion characters

  • Crafting & Customization

    • Character customization

    • Item synthesis system

  • Stunning Presentation

    • Hand-drawn sprite artwork

    • Original soundtrack by Sette & Federico Dubbini

And many more features to discover

content_descriptors.notes: Foul language, sexual content including partial nudity, violence, blood, drug references.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not hardware extensive at all

short_description: Journey into the world of Creator, where ancient secrets lie beneath neon-lit cities and mechanical titans roam alongside monsters. In Creator - [deep.sleeper] Saga, forge your path as Sonder Moor through three interconnected volumes of discovery and destiny.
